mapper.select: select notice_no, notice_category, notice_title, notice_adminID, notice_date, notice_hit, notice_contents, notice_no, nt_file_size from ( select row_number() over (partition by a.notice_no order by a.notice_no desc) rn, a.notice_no as notice_no, a.notice_category as notice_category, a.notice_title as notice_title, a.notice_adminID as notice_adminID, a.notice_date as notice_date, a.notice_hit as notice_hit, a.notice_contents as notice_contents, b.nt_file_size as nt_file_size from notice a, nt_file b where a.notice_no = b.notice_no(+) and notice_category = any('[공지]') order by a.notice_no desc ) where rn = 1

select notice_no, notice_category, notice_title, notice_adminID, notice_date, notice_hit, notice_contents, notice_no, nt_file_size from ( select row_number() over (partition by a.notice_no order by a.notice_no desc) rn, a.notice_no as notice_no, a.notice_category as notice_category, a.notice_title as notice_title, a.notice_adminID as notice_adminID, a.notice_date as notice_date, a.notice_hit as notice_hit, a.notice_contents as notice_contents, b.nt_file_size as nt_file_size from notice a, nt_file b where a.notice_no = b.notice_no(+) and notice_category = any('[일반]','[안내]','[모집]','[추가모집]','[채용예정자]') order by a.notice_no desc ) where rn = 1
mapper.insert:
SELECT notice_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into notice(notice_no, notice_category, notice_title, notice_contents, notice_adminID) VALUES (#{notice_no}, #{notice_category}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_contents}, #{notice_adminID})
mapper.select: select notice_no, notice_category, notice_title, notice_contents, notice_adminID, notice_date, to_char(notice_date, 'yyyy.mm.dd') as noticeDate, notice_hit from notice where notice_no = #{notice_no}
mapper.update: update notice set notice_category = #{notice_category}, notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_adminID = #{notice_adminID}, notice_contents = #{notice_contents} where notice_no = #{notice_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NT_FILE( NT_FILE_NO, NOTICE_NO, ORG_NT_FILE_NAME, STR_NT_FILE_NAME, NT_FILE_SIZE )VALUES( NT_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{NOTICE_NO, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ORG_NT_FILE_NAME, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{STR_NT_FILE_NAME, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NT_FILE_SIZE, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: SELECT NT_FILE_NO, ORG_NT_FILE_NAME, STR_NT_FILE_NAME, ROUND(NT_FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS NT_FILE_SIZE FROM NT_FILE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{NOTICE_NO, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND NT_FILE_DEL = 'N' ORDER BY NT_FILE_NO ASC
SELECT STR_NT_FILE_NAME, ORG_NT_FILE_NAME FROM NT_FILE WHERE NT_FILE_NO = #{NT_FILE_NO, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: UPDATE NT_FILE SET NT_FILE_DEL = 'Y', NT_FILE_SIZE = 0 WHERE NT_FILE_NO = #{NT_FILE_NO, jdbcType=INTEGER}
